br.com.limaogames.librpg.framework.interfaces

Interface ArmorListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Armor

    public interface ArmorListener
    Interface that implements common methods used by Armor instance.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Limao Games
    Email: andreikeda@limaogames.com.br
    created on: 07/02/2014
    See Also:
    Armor.Type

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void create(long id, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, int[] attRequirements, double cost, int quantity, Damage redutor, int durability, Armor.Type type)
      Creates instance of Armor.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        void create(long id,
          java.lang.String name,
          java.lang.String description,
          int[] attRequirements,
          double cost,
          int quantity,
          Damage redutor,
          int durability,
          Armor.Type type)
        Creates instance of Armor.
        Parameters:
        id - - object's identifier.
        name - - object's name. It can be null, but it's not recommended.
        description - - object's description. It can be null.
        attRequirements - - object's attribute values requirements.
        cost - - object's price.
        quantity - - object's quantity.
        redutor - - object's that stores the amount of reduction to decrement from damage Adventurer will take from enemies attacks.
        durability - - object's durability. If it reaches 0, the object is destroyed.
        type - - Armor.Type
